title: Discover
subtitle: Learn the basic ideas behind evolution
instructions:
Follow the clues to find the items within the museum.
The app should trigger automatically as you approach the correct item, or you can enter the unlock code shown next to the item.
Look out for the Sensing Evolution logo.
